description: One of FITE's (Forum of IT Employees) chapters, located in Pune, became the first registered trade union for IT industry. FITE helps IT employees through legal actions under the Industrial Disputes Act. The Pune chapter can now represent IT employees statewide. FITE also mobilizes to help IT workers and laid off employees utilize resources.
author: hyatt d.
